definition: An electronic check that verifies patient’s active insurance coverage and benefits before services are provided.
example_usage: Front desk staff run RTE before scheduling.

definition: A fixed amount a patient pays for a healthcare service, usually at the time of visit.
example_usage: Patient paid a $20 co-pay at check-in.

definition: The amount a patient must pay for covered services before insurance begins to pay.
example_usage: The patient has a $1,500 deductible to meet.

definition: The percentage of costs the patient pays after meeting the deductible.
example_usage: Patient responsible for 20% coinsurance.

definition: A statement from insurance showing what was covered and what the patient owes.
example_usage: Patient reviewed EOB to understand bill.

definition: Insurance plan requiring patients to use a defined network of providers.
example_usage: Patient’s HMO required referral to specialist.

definition: Insurance plan allowing more flexibility in choosing providers.
example_usage: PPO allowed patient to see out-of-network provider at higher cost.

definition: System of codes for diagnoses used in billing and documentation.
example_usage: Provider coded hypertension as ICD-10 I10.

definition: Codes used to describe medical, surgical, and diagnostic services for billing.
example_usage: Office visit billed under CPT 99213.

definition: Section of clinical note describing the patient’s current symptoms.
example_usage: Provider documented chest pain in HPI.

definition: Checklist of body systems reviewed for symptoms.
example_usage: ROS positive for fatigue.

definition: Section of clinical note documenting provider’s exam findings.
example_usage: PE noted normal heart sounds.

definition: Condition identified by provider based on evaluation.
example_usage: Dx: Type 2 Diabetes.

definition: Therapy or intervention prescribed for a condition.
example_usage: Tx plan included medication and exercise.

definition: Ongoing record of patient’s active and resolved medical issues.
example_usage: Problem list updated with hypertension.

definition: A documented patient interaction (visit, telehealth, call) recorded in the EHR.
example_usage: Refill request documented outside encounter.

definition: A group of related encounters for a condition over time.
example_usage: Episode for diabetes included labs and visits.

definition: Measures WBC, RBC, hemoglobin, hematocrit, platelets.
example_usage: CBC ordered to evaluate anemia.

definition: Includes: Sodium (Na), Potassium (K), Chloride (Cl), CO2 (bicarbonate), Blood Urea Nitrogen (BUN), Creatinine, Glucose, Calcium.
example_usage: BMP ordered for dehydration to monitor electrolytes.

definition: Includes: BMP tests plus Albumin, Total Protein, AST, ALT, ALP, Bilirubin.
example_usage: CMP ordered for liver function and electrolytes.

definition: Includes: Total Cholesterol, HDL, LDL, Triglycerides.
example_usage: Lipid panel ordered for cardiovascular risk assessment.

definition: Includes: TSH, Free T4, Total T4, Free T3, Total T3.
example_usage: Thyroid panel ordered for fatigue evaluation.
